alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 741 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds along a line extending from 6 miles east of Truckton to 13 miles southeast of Hanover to 10 miles north of Pueblo Depot. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
